item.title: Some 508 server questions
item.dc:creator: @Hey3 Hey*
item.description:
@Hey3 wrote:

I got these commands:

[code] if (cmd[0].equals(“showinterface”)) {
p.frames.showInterface(p, Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]));

            } else if (cmd[0].equals("emote")) {
                p.requestAnim(Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), 0);

            } else if (cmd[0].equals("gfx")) {
                p.requestGFX(Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), 0);

            } else if (cmd[0].equals("npc")) {
                Server.engine.newNPC(Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), p.absX,
                        p.absY, p.heightLevel, p.absX + 1, p.absY + 1,
                        p.absX + -1, p.absY + -1, false);
            }

            } else if (cmd[0].equals("coords")) {
                p.frames.sendMessage(p, "x: " + p.absX + ", y: " + p.absY);
            }

            } else if (cmd[0].equals("tele")) {
                int x = Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]);
                int y = Integer.parseInt(cmd[2]);
                int h = Integer.parseInt(cmd[3]);
		  p.setCoords(x, y, h);
            }[/code]

Coords command doesn’t work :S Don’t know why.

And … How do I trigger tele command?
::tele Xcoord Ycoord? I tried adding Height too ::tele 1337 1337 1 but nothing :S
How do I trigger npc, emote, GFX and showinterface commands???

And can somebody give WORKING ancient tab interface? Cause mine aint working:

} else if (cmd[0].equals("ancients")) { p.frames.setTab(p, 79, 388); // Magic tab }
I got all the runes and I try clicking on barrage spell, but nothing happens.
It says unpacked handler or smth like that …

Help! Will earn rep++!

Read full topic
